title: Subpart 383-4 - Permit Modification for Facility Closure and Post-Closure Observation and Maintenance
content:

State Regulations
§ 383-4.1 - Procedures
§ 383-4.2 - Application requirements
§ 383-4.3 - Contents of complete application for a permit modification for facility closure
§ 383-4.4 - Filing and distribution of the facility closure application
§ 383-4.5 - Standards for permit modification for facility closure
§ 383-4.6 - Notice of department's decision

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
